common.io_name: 금융 소비자 법 계약서 설명서 LMS 전송 처리

io.name: SSUICTJA0240201_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:SSUICTJA0240201_inbound" /> <complexType name="SSUICTJA0240201_inbound"> <sequence> <element name="sendDtlRowcount"> <annotation> <documentation>발송내역건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="sendDtlList" type="tns:SEND_DTL_LIST_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>발송내역</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="SEND_DTL_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SEND_DTL_LIST_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="iudFlagVal"> <annotation> <documentation>신규수정삭제플래그값</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="sendGb"> <annotation> <documentation>발송구분</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="crdMemNo"> <annotation> <documentation>카드회원번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="9" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="memNm"> <annotation> <documentation>회원명</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="100" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="mphonNo"> <annotation> <documentation>휴대폰번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="16" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="selfFamlGbcd"> <annotation> <documentation>본인가족구분코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="본인가족구분코드" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="acptStoreCd"> <annotation> <documentation>접수점코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="3" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="crdAcptDt"> <annotation> <documentation>카드접수일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="crdAcptNo"> <annotation> <documentation>카드접수번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

io.name: SSUICTJA0240201_OUTBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:SSUICTJA0240201_outbound" /> <complexType name="SSUICTJA0240201_outbound"> <sequence> <element name="sendDtlRowcount"> <annotation> <documentation>발송내역건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="sendDtlList" type="tns:SEND_DTL_LIST_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>발송내역</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="SEND_DTL_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SEND_DTL_LIST_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="procRstCd"> <annotation> <documentation>처리결과코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="처리결과코드" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
